name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It's quite humorous. I'm about to become a deadbeat because of 300 yuan. The reason is that my Alipay account has been frozen by the court, but my Huabei and Jiebei accounts have not been frozen. I keep telling you that I'm overdue for 300 yuan every month. Yesterday, I asked my mother to transfer 600 yuan to see if it can be automatically deducted. The money was transferred in, but it was frozen by the court as soon as it arrived, and I can't pay back Huabei. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Dodo13080274 It was there before, but I can't find the entrance anymore

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @sushang918 I think they are even worse off than me, after all, they are in China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 14, multiple media outlets reported that a vicious assault occurred in Xing County, Lüliang City, Shanxi Province. The suspect, Guo Mouliang, killed the victim, Guo Mouying, and her family of four due to an emotional dispute, and then drove away in a white car, knocking down a police officer and 13 pedestrians in the process. So far, 7 people have died and 11 have been injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"Universal free medical care is the most important"
On May 13, Huanqiu.com released a video saying, "Hua Chunying tweeted a picture to make the latest comparison between China and the United States: China invests in people VS the United States invests in war."
However, surprisingly, the 17,000 comments were overshadowed by the public's call for "universal free medical care".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, the comment section of this video was cleaned up, and only 139 comments remained out of 17,478.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Summary of two Xi'an netizens' contributions
1. Near the Central Asia Summit, some Xi'an citizens received calls from the street office, requiring residents on both sides of the street where the summit motorcade will pass to "voluntarily leave Xi'an" in the near future. If they do not leave, they must give reasons and apply for entry and exit permits. 
"They called and harassed me every two or three days and asked me to leave."
2. Some stores in Xi'an were asked not to use electronic advertising screens such as advertising machines, fearing that someone would project a screen. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, the Education Bureau of Lantian County, Xi'an City requires students and teachers to report all their social app accounts and contact numbers for record.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A middle school in Xi'an requires students to sign a "commitment not to participate in assisting information network (assisting information) criminal activities".
However, the title of the shared file is "commitment to assist information network criminal activities", which has aroused the concern of netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ton1322117399 Oh my god, can you stop talking? You are so stupid that my hair is about to fall out

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Chinese student studying in Russia posted a video on TikTok showing how he was discriminated against and provoked by a Russian soldier who had returned from the Russian-Ukrainian battlefield.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @JXY66233 It turns out that it’s all capital’s fault.
